reviewText: This is a great set of routines for anyone looking to start a yoga practice or add some yoga to their existing work out routines. I normally do Insanity Max 30 but needed to increase flexibility and have something for my recovery days. As someone who used to do a lot of yoga this dvd has helped me reincorporate it into my life and the programs compliment my other work outs really well.
This Rodney Yee program is a fine introduction to Hatha  yoga and is calming and easy to follow. A good start.
